page.para: Fa/ti/ma loves to read. She likes to read in the for/est.
One day some/thing fell on Fa/ti/ma’s head. It was a ver/y tiny book.
Fa/ti/ma looked up. She could see a ver/y small tree squir/rel.
The squir/rel looked down at Fa/ti/ma. They said hel/lo to one an/oth/er.
Fa/ti/ma want/ed to meet the squir/rel. She used bal/loons to float up high.
Fa/ti/ma reached a big branch. The squir/rel was wait/ing there for her.
Fa/ti/ma and the squir/rel played in the top of the tree. They had great fun.
They met a col/our/ful frog. He was all the col/ours of the rain/bow.
They met a nois/y bird. He said hel/lo and wel/come.
Fa/ti/ma made man/y friends that day. She often goes to vis/it them!
